hero.tagline: Get instant access to doctors, medicines, and emergency services.

authForm.title: Create Account
authForm.subtitle: Let's get you started with MediLink.

roleSelection.selectRole: Select your role to get started.
roleSelection.toastDescription: Please select a role to continue.
roleSelection.toastErrorUser: User data not found. Please register again.
roleSelection.toastErrorRole: Failed to save role. Please try again.

doctorRegForm.subtitle: Complete your profile to start consulting patients.
doctorRegForm.toastDescription: Your profile is under review. We will notify you upon verification.

pharmacyRegForm.title: Joining Pharmacy
pharmacyRegForm.subtitle: Complete your profile to manage medicines, stock, and deliveries.
pharmacyRegForm.toastDescription: Your pharmacy profile is under review. We will notify you upon verification.

medicalHistory.title: Personalize Your Healthcare
medicalHistory.subtitle: Please share a few details about your medical history. This helps us provide you with the best care.
medicalHistory.conditionsLabel: Do you have any pre-existing conditions?
medicalHistory.conditionsDescription: List any chronic or significant health issues you have.
medicalHistory.medicationsLabel: Are you currently taking any medications?
medicalHistory.medicationsDescription: Please include the name, dosage, and frequency.
medicalHistory.medicationsPlaceholder: e.g., Metformin 500mg twice daily, Aspirin 81mg once daily
medicalHistory.allergiesDescription: Include medications, food, or environmental allergies.
medicalHistory.familyHistoryLabel: Is there a family history of major diseases?
medicalHistory.familyHistoryDescription: Mention any significant health issues in your immediate family.
medicalHistory.addressDescription: This helps in case of emergencies and for medicine delivery.
medicalHistory.reportsTooltip: Your data is stored securely and only shared with your doctor.
medicalHistory.reportsDescription: Upload lab reports, prescriptions, or past diagnoses here.
medicalHistory.toastDescription: Thanks for sharing. Your health profile is ready.

patientDashboard.subtitle: Book your first appointment to get started with your healthcare journey.
patientDashboard.symptomCheckerDesc: Describe your symptoms to get a primary diagnosis and find the right doctor.
patientDashboard.videoConsultationDesc: Have a face-to-face consultation with your doctor from the comfort of your home.
patientDashboard.smartRemindersDesc: Get timely alerts for medicines, appointments, and follow-ups.
patientDashboard.manageAppointmentsDesc: View upcoming consultations or book a new one.
patientDashboard.findDoctorsDesc: Find doctors by specialty and location.
patientDashboard.searchByLocation: Search by City or Pin Code...
patientDashboard.noDoctorsFound: No doctors found matching your criteria.
patientDashboard.nearbyPharmaciesDesc: Find pharmacies in your area for medicine delivery.
patientDashboard.noPharmaciesFound: No pharmacies found in your area.
patientDashboard.yourMedicationsDesc: Keep track of your active prescriptions and set reminders.
patientDashboard.yourReportsDesc: All your uploaded health documents in one place.
patientDashboard.healthDataPlaceholder: Health data from wearables and manual inputs will be available here in the future.

doctorDashboard.subtitle: Manage your appointments, patients, and reports all in one place.
doctorDashboard.patientMessagesDesc: Respond to patient queries and manage communications.
doctorDashboard.viewReportsDesc: Access and review patient medical reports and history.
doctorDashboard.healthAnalyticsDesc: View analytics on patient data and consultation trends.
doctorDashboard.manageAppointmentsDesc: View your schedule or add a new consultation.
doctorDashboard.yourPatientsDesc: View and manage your list of assigned patients.
doctorDashboard.pastConsultationsDesc: Review history of your video and in-person consultations.
doctorDashboard.consultationsPlaceholder: Consultation history will be available here.
doctorDashboard.nearbyPharmaciesDesc: Find local pharmacies to send prescriptions to.
doctorDashboard.noPharmaciesFound: No pharmacies found in your clinic's area.
doctorDashboard.patientReportsDesc: Review and manage uploaded patient reports.
doctorDashboard.reportsPlaceholder: A list of patient reports pending review will appear here.

pharmacyDashboard.subtitle: Manage prescriptions, inventory, orders, and deliveries easily.
pharmacyDashboard.prescriptionQueueDesc: View and process incoming prescriptions from patients and doctors.
pharmacyDashboard.searchPlaceholder: Search by patient name or prescription ID...
pharmacyDashboard.manageInventoryDesc: Keep track of your medicine stock and expiry dates.

sos.title: Are you experiencing a medical emergency?
sos.description: This action will immediately alert the nearest available ambulance or local transport service to your location. Only confirm if you are in a genuine emergency.
sos.toastDescription: The nearest ambulance has been notified and is on their way.

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: Explore the comprehensive features MediLink offers to revolutionize rural healthcare.

aiDoctor.title: AI Doctor & Teleconsultation
aiDoctor.description: Get instant AI-driven consultations and connect with doctors via video.

digitalPrescriptions.title: Digital Prescriptions & Records
digitalPrescriptions.description: Access your prescriptions and health records securely, anytime, anywhere.

medicineOrdering.title: Medicine Availability & Ordering
medicineOrdering.description: Check local medicine availability and order them for pickup or delivery.

pharmacyIntegration.title: Pharmacy Integration & Delivery
pharmacyIntegration.description: Seamlessly connect with local pharmacies for quick medicine fulfillment.

smartAlerts.title: Reminders & Smart Alerts
smartAlerts.description: Never miss a dose or an appointment with our intelligent reminder system.

emergencySOS.title: Emergency SOS
emergencySOS.description: Alert the nearest ambulance with a single tap in case of an emergency.

hero.title: About MediLink
hero.subtitle: Bridging rural healthcare gaps with AI-powered telemedicine.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: To make quality healthcare accessible, affordable, and actionable for every individual in rural India, leveraging technology to connect patients, doctors, and pharmacies seamlessly.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.statement: We envision a future where geographical barriers no longer determine the quality of healthcare. Through innovation and a deep commitment to rural communities, MediLink aims to build a robust, intelligent, and interconnected healthcare ecosystem that empowers individuals and strengthens community well-being.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Creating a connected healthcare ecosystem for everyone.

patients.title: For Patients
patients.description: Instant access to medical advice, easy medicine ordering, and secure health records, all from their fingertips.

doctors.title: For Doctors
doctors.description: A streamlined platform to manage patient consultations, issue digital prescriptions, and extend their reach.

pharmacies.title: For Pharmacies
pharmacies.description: Efficiently manage inventory, process digital prescriptions, and coordinate local deliveries to serve the community better.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or need support? We're here to help.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you shortly.
form.name: Full Name

toast.title: Message Sent!
toast.description: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

chatbot.label: AI Assistant
chatbot.value: Available 24/7 on our app for instant help.
